item.title: Welcome to My Cybersecurity Blog
item.description:
👋 Hello and Welcome!

I’m Talen Neil Serrao, a graduate in Cybersecurity and Ethical Hacking from Coventry University 🇬🇧 — awarded First Class Honours. This blog is where I share my journey, experiments, and insights in the world of cybersecurity.

🧠 What You’ll Find Here

  • 🔍 Writeups of penetration testing labs and challenges (e.g. TryHackMe, HackTheBox)
  • 🛠️ Projects I’ve built — from reverse engineering tools to AI-enhanced detection systems
  • 🧬 Deep dives into buffer overflows, ROP chains, DoS attacks, and secure protocols
  • 🔐 Insights on cryptography, exploit development, and ethical hacking techniques

🧰 Tech I Use

  • Languages: Python, Bash, C, C++, JavaScript
  • Tools: Ghidra, Metasploit, Cutter, Wireshark, Burp Suite, Scapy, Pwntools
  • AI/ML: Neural networks with PyTorch for attack classification
  • Protocols: TCP/IP, DNS, HTTPS, Wi-Fi, and encrypted comms using AES-GCM

🚀 Why I Built This Site

To document and reflect on my learning, give back to the community, and stay sharp by sharing knowledge publicly. Cybersecurity is a fast-evolving field, and I believe in learning by doing — and teaching.
